imdb.title: Ôkami to kôshinryô
imdb.plot: Kraft Lawrence goes from town to town to make profits as a travelling merchant, with the help of a wolf deity by the name of Holo.

episodes.title: Wolf and the Inadvertent Rift
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo travel to Kumersun, where a pagan festival is taking place.

episodes.title: Wolf and the Calm Before the Storm
episodes.plot: Instead of taking Holo to the festival as planned, Lawrence is taken by fellow merchant Gi Batos to meet Dian "Diana" Rubens, a chronicler, to learn more about Yoitsu.

episodes.title: Wolf and the Gap That Cannot Be Filled
episodes.plot: In front of the Rowen Trading Guild, Amarti challenges Lawrence, proclaiming he will pay for Holo's falsified debt of one thousand Trenni silver coins and then propose to her, certain that she will leave Lawrence.

episodes.title: Wolf and the End of Shallow Thinking
episodes.plot: Lawrence realizes that he has to drop the price of pyrite or risk losing Holo to Amarti.

episodes.title: Wolf, Hope and Despair
episodes.plot: To gain access to the alchemists' quarter, Lawrence asks Batos for a password to meet Diana.

episodes.title: Wolf and Trustworthy God
episodes.plot: Lawrence participates in the pyrite market, selling small quantities several times to combat the rapidly rising prices, but to no avail.

episodes.title: Wolf and Playful Days
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo make their way to the chilly port town of Lenos, known for its wood and fur.

episodes.title: Wolf and an Enchanting Traveler
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo visit the port in Lenos, where they sit down for a meal.

episodes.title: Wolf and Reckless Negotiation
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo go to see Rigoro and are at first awed by the magnificent garden in a large greenhouse behind his house.

episodes.title: Wolf and Lonely Smile
episodes.plot: Eve explains to Lawrence that they will sell Holo to gain cash, which they will then use to buy the fur in town.

episodes.title: Wolf and the Decision to Part
episodes.plot: Ruzz Elingin, a representative of the Derink Trading Company, proposes to purchase Holo with sixty Lumione gold coins instead of two thousand Trenni silver coins because of their inability to procure the necessary silver, and Lawrence agrees to the deal.

episodes.title: Wolf and Endless Tears
episodes.plot: Even in light of the chaos caused by the coup d'état, Lawrence and Eve decide to continue with their plan.

episodes.title: Ôkami to icchôra
episodes.plot: A merchant named Lawrence encounters Holo, a girl with the ears and tail of a wolf. An ancient goddess who longs to return to her northern home, she joins Lawrence in his travels.

episodes.title: Ôkami to tôi kako
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo meet a young merchant who shares a scheme he hopes will bring profit. Holo teaches Lawrence how to relate to folks who may wish to deceive.

episodes.title: Ôkami to shônin
episodes.plot: Holo's wily charm helps Lawrence get a great price in a fur trade, and the money exchanging scheme might be too good to be true.

episodes.title: Ôkami to muryoku na aibô
episodes.plot: Following an ambush by business competitors, Lawrence receives a letter which holds disturbing information regarding Holo's plight.

episodes.title: Ôkami to chiwa genka
episodes.plot: In the midst of rescuing Holo, Lawrence learns that the face behind the recent shady dealings is very familiar.

episodes.title: Ôkami to mugon no wakare
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo might be separated for good after the untamed girl unleashes her powers to defeat a threat lurking beneath the city.

episodes.title: Ôkami to kôfuku no shippo
episodes.plot: Lawrence uses his crafty business sense (while Holo utilizes her considerable charisma) to get a great deal on some expensive clothes.

episodes.title: Ôkami to tadashiki tenbin
episodes.plot: Amid rumors of danger ahead, Holo and Lawrence move on after exposing a swindler. The next soul encountered on the road north makes the little wolf very uneasy.

episodes.title: Ôkami to hitsuji tsukai no ko hitsuji
episodes.plot: After arriving in the next town, an old friend greets Lawrence warmly. But Holo is uneasy with their newest traveling companion.

episodes.title: Ôkami to uzu maku inbô
episodes.plot: Lawrence is suddenly burdened with a large amount of debt. If he doesn?t find a way out of the situation, he could lose more than his business.

episodes.title: Ôkami to saidai no hisaku
episodes.plot: Lawrence and Holo devise a plan to relieve their debt and must attempt to persuade the shepherd to take part in the risky scheme.

episodes.title: Ôkami to wakazô no mure
episodes.plot: Just as it looks like the smuggling plot will succeed, Lawrence learns a hard truth about wolves in sheep?s clothing.

episodes.title: Ôkami to arata na tabidachi
episodes.plot: Lawrence settles the score with those who betrayed him and finds that even in a life based on profit and debt, some things are more valuable than others.
